# ta-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                   | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `shape`  | `shape`   | Set the shape of borders button. Can be set to circle, round or square. If not set, the default value will be set to 'square'                 | `string` | `'square'`  |
| `type`   | `type`    | Set the type of button. Can be set to primarydasheddanger or omitted (meaning default) If not set, the default value will be set to 'default' | `string` | `'default'` |
